name: SK8-Beat
description:
Play as the young magic apprentice Wilfred in his skateboard adventures.

On his free time, he is always skateboarding while listening to some music. However, in this magical world, his music affect his whole surroundings, which annoys his neighborhood very much. They'll do anything to stop him, even attacking him, to make him stop. He will never stop.

Music based shootem up made at Ican's studio during 2022. (first year's project)

You need a controller to play.
